fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Pay another player to stand guard outside your house at night.
-Throw a bulletproof vest at someone, attacking them (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players you pay will defend you from one direct attacker. If you’re attacked, they will die instead. They will attack the attacker with whatever level of attack they have
-Their cause of death will appear to be “Died while protecting someone”
-This role is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (May win while dead)
